short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take the politics out of your Internet with Snapple’s new Headline Hacker.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you tired of election coverage? Want more fun in your news feed? Use Snapple’s new Headline Hacker to turn the political conversation from furious to flavorful. It finds the election buzzwords in your Internet and replaces them with something much more entertaining. A “convention” becomes a “food fight.” A “debate” is now a “jamboree.” The list goes on…let the humor begin!
